articles.author: Aamir Khollam
articles.title: Plasma tech zaps air into clean ammonia without gas or pressure - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: New plasma-electrolyzer system turns air into green ammonia gas, offering a low-cost, fossil-free alternative to dirty fertilizer production.
articles.content:
The Sydney teams approach uses plasma to excite nitrogen and oxygen in the air, then converts those molecules into ammonia gas through a membrane-based electrolyzer.
The study outlines how this two-… [+680 chars]
